description:
It was first seen battling and defeating Karate Master`s Hitmonchan and it hit it so hard that it went through the front doors of the Fighting Dojo just as Ash Ketchum was arriving and it landed on top of him.
Bea`s Grapploct battled against Ash`s Riolu at the Fighting Dojo in Saffron City as part of Pok√©mon World Coronation Series Great Class battle. Its tentacles have terrifying power for squeezing attacks and it was able to grab Riolu with them multiple times throughout the battle. It defeated Ash`s Riolu to give Bea the match victory and lower his ranking to 930.
name: Otosupus (Saitou)
